title: 547 Grand Hill / 950 SqFt / 3rd Floor in 3-plex / SEPTEMBER
neighborhood: St. Paul -- Crocus/Ramsey Hill, Summit Hill
posting_body: ['2-BR apartment --', 'Available September 2022', '547 Grand Hill, St Paul, MN 55102 -- 3rd floor', 'This bright and sunny top floor apartment comes with a great view of daily sunsets.', 'Rent: $1,310/mo + Utilities  (Electric; Natural Gas heat, Hot water, Stove).', ' Owner pays cold water.', 'Lease: Required through July 31, 2023', 'Great Location!', "- You're in the heart of Crocus Hill and Summit Hill and just feet away from Grand Avenue...however you're in a very nice and quiet residential area.", '- One block south of Summit Ave.', '- 1-1/4 blocks east of Dale St.', '- You are close to the many shops and scenic areas St. Paul has to offer.', '- For law students, we are 3/4-mile east of Mitchell Hamline.', ' #GreatForMitchellStudents #GreatForMitchellHamlineStudents', '- On the city bus line to Downtown St. Paul or Minneapolis.', 'Our unit features:', '- Approx 950 sq ft.', '- 2-BR, LR/DR, Kitchen, Bath, Lots of closet space', '- Carpeted floors', "- Twin or Full size beds fit best (king bed won't fit, queen box spring is hard to move up the stairwell)", '- Six total skylights (in entry hall, den, kitchen, 1BR)', '- Many steps to the unit, no elevator.', ' Somewhat narrow staircase so really large furniture will not fit through the stairwell.', '- Laundry in basement common area.', '- Strict no smoking policy in this building or anywhere on the property.', '- Sorry, no animals allowed (not even with a higher deposit).', '- Lovely backyard deck and yard!', '- On-street parking only, no garage or off-street parking available.', 'For more information, please contact the property managers directly and reference this CL ad:', 'Alisa or Brenna', 'Day:', 'show contact info', 'Evening:', 'show contact info', 'Email:  see craigslist "reply to" link at top of this ad', 'Website for more information:', 'http://www.apts.cc', 'This 2BR APARTMENT is for rent at 547 Grand Hill, Saint Paul, MN 55102']
